featured.text: Arms extending horizontally commanded drivers to stop, whereas arms lowered to a 45-degree angle told drivers to move on, resembling a traffic director’s gestures.
We all have grown up with this popular version, but the 31 fable can be extended with different twists.
Familiar fables can be narrated differently or extended in interesting and humorous ways.

definition.zh_def: 延伸，擴展或增加某物的範圍、大小或持續時間。
definition.en_def: To increase the length, area, or duration of something.
definition.example: We need to extend the deadline for the project.
